objects.description: [EKANS](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0017) performs a DNS lookup of an internal domain name associated with its target network to identify if it was deployed on the intended system. (Citation: Ben Hunter and Fred Gutierrez July 2020)

external_references.source_name: Ben Hunter and Fred Gutierrez July 2020
external_references.description: Ben Hunter and Fred Gutierrez 2020, July 01 EKANS Ransomware Targeting OT ICS Systems Retrieved. 2021/04/12
